title: Pilgrims
notes: Supports EOS Overlay for additional features (optional). Epic achievements working. Can play in offline mode. Native controller support. **Decky Plugin: Works out of the box**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**.
description: Roam the land as you please and make new friends, share a laugh with your fellow travellers and help them complete their little stories, your way. How many different solutions can you find?
